page.title: 07PENZANCE DRY DOCK
page.content: The average number of boats that they get in the dry dock is about 35,but it depends on how long they take to repair.They've never had a busiest day as every day is busy. They've had ships that have had too much work on to do,but instead of moving them to another dry dock,they put them into the floating dock and get more men. The next ship they're expecting is a light vessel or an oil tanker. They have had water leaking in after they've pumped it out.Only once they've had a vessel that's had to go to the scrapyard. The longest time that the workmen have repaired a boat is 3 months.There are 70 men down there.The main materials that they use are metal plates,pipes and spare parts. Penzance is the{only dry dock}to make a manned lightship into an automatic one. Alv.
